frontMatter.title: Derivatives Game
frontMatter.subtitle: A simulation for a better understanding of exchange-traded financial derivatives
objectives: Understand the elementary differences between futures and options
Be able to take long and short positions in futures and options and close them out
Get to know the process of derivatives trading from the formation of a contract to its maturity date
frontMatter.imprint: Department of Banking and Finance, University of Zurich
frontMatter.contact: [Dr. Benjamin Wilding](https://www.bf.uzh.ch/de/persons/wilding-benjamin), Department of Banking and Finance, University of Zurich
